faqs.question: What is the basic Merchant Navy course offered?
faqs.answer: The main course is 4-year degree B.Tech in Marine Engineering or B.Sc in Nautical Science. Additional specialized certifications include Basic Safety Training (BST), Proficiency in Personal Survival Techniques (PSST), and Security Awareness Training.

key_facts.fact: Duration: 4 years academic + 12-18 months onboard training
